title: BBC Radio Documentary -- Taxi to the Darkside
description:
BBC Radio Documentary -- Taxi to the Darkside

In Taxi To The Dark Side, American film-maker Alex Gibney 
reports on the use of torture by American soldiers in Afghanistan. 
Was the torture the work of a few rogue soldiers, or officially 
approved by the Pentagon?

Broadcast BBC Radio 4, 30 May, 2008
